fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Transport
head_office_address: Muntplein 10 1012 WR Amsterdam The Netherlands Junolaan 10 2741 TJ Waddinxveen The Netherlands 9 Rue Moliere 76240 Le Mesnil-Esnard France
eu_initiatives:
SAGMAS (maritime security) 
Motorways of the Seas 
STM Validation Project
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: shipmasters associations in Germany, France, Italy, Spain, The Netherlands, Belgium, Ireland, Slovenia, Latvia, Portugal, Bulgaria, Lithuania, Croatia
goals__remit:
to worldwide protect the professional interests and status of European seagoing shipmasters. 
to protect maritime safety and protect the maritime environment. 
to inform the public in the eu about the european maritime industry and those concerning shipmasters in particular 
to retain and develop the highest maritime knowledge and experience in europe 
to be involved in research concerning maritime matters. 
to promote the seafaring profession in eu member states
